name: Dunns River
description:
Dunn's River is said to be  one of the 8th wonders of the world.
﻿It is one of Jamaica's main attractions loved by everyone that visits the island. Climb the 600 feet cascading waterfalls that takes approximately 45 mins to an hour to climb.
﻿
﻿After a funfilled adventure its time to have some Jamaican Jerk Chicken, Pork, Festival, Rice&Peas with a cold Red Stripe Beer.
Take walk through Columbus Park and see replica of his ship and other historic items on display.
